text:
Now we're going to climb up 400 steps to visit
the Cave Pagoda.
So why are you so sweaty boy?

I just climbed 400 steps and I'm not just
sweating profusely.

This is one of the more quirky temples I've
visited.

There is a Buddha wearing sunglasses - that
is pretty chill.
It is just rice fields as far as you can see.

So this cave pagoda temple has been surprinsingly
impressive.

It is actually quite stunning and elaborate
and the views are spectacular.

If anyone wants to come here this is near
the Vietnamese - Cambodian border in the far
